Package proj

Class CourseListCtrl

java.lang.Object
proj.CourseListCtrl
public class CourseListCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the control class for courseList which holds an array list of Courses.
Since:
2020-11-19
Version:
1.0
Author:
DSAI/1 Group 5

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.Scanner sc
    Scanner to scan user's input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CourseListCtrl()
    Reads in the list of courses from SerializeDB

  • Method Details

    • getCourseList

      public java.util.ArrayList<Course> getCourseList()
      Gets the course list stored in this courseListControl class
      Returns:
      ArrayList of courses

    • setCourseList

      public void setCourseList​(java.util.ArrayList<Course> CourseList)
      Sets the courseList
      Parameters:
      CourseList - ArrayList of Courses

    • getCourse

      public Course getCourse​(int index)
      Gets course object from courseList ArrayList by parameter index.
      Parameters:
      index - The parameter index
      Returns:
      The course object of the selected index.

    • addNewCourse

      public int addNewCourse​(java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String courseID)
      Allows admin user to add new courses to courseListControl ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The course Name of the new course.
      courseID - The course ID of the new course.
      Returns:
      0 when the course is successfully added, -1 when its not.

    • editCourse

      public java.lang.String editCourse​(int choice, int courseIdChoice, java.lang.String edited)
      Allows admin user to edit Course stored in the courseList ArrayList
      Parameters:
      choice - 1= editing course Name , 2= editing course ID
      courseIdChoice - The index parameters admin have chosen.
      edited - The new courseName/courseID.
      Returns:
      the initial course Name/ course ID of the course.

    • chooseCourse

      public java.lang.String chooseCourse()
      Allows users to choose a valid Course in the courseList.
      Returns:
      The courseID of the valid course.

    • deleteCourse

      public void deleteCourse​(int choice)
      Allows admin to delete course from courseList.
      Parameters:
      choice - The index parameter of courseList.

    • getCourseSize

      public int getCourseSize()
      Gets the number of courses in courseList ArrayList.
      Returns:
      The number of courses.

    • printCourseDetails

      public static void printCourseDetails​(int i)
      Prints a course in course List and their details.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the course in courseList ArrayList.

    • printAllCourseDetails

      public void printAllCourseDetails()
      Prints all courses in course List ArrayList and their details

    • save

      public void save()
      When called, save the current edited curseList object to SerializeDB.
